name: Stream of Life
description:
Game Description: You're playing as a small salmon trying to go back to the ocean down the river stream. The gameplay mechanic itself is to not get hit and dodge incoming obstacles to 'win' the game. However, the twist is that the game that will occasionally hit you with some life quotes.

Team Name: Flavo

The game is made as a submission to Arkav Game Jam 2021 with the theme 'Stream'. This game is about a salmon swimming through the river stream that somehow relates to the cycle/way/'stream' of life. Life is like a river, you can't control it however you want, ride the current downstream!

font used: 
- Baby Pumpkin
https://www.1001freefonts.com/baby-pumpkin.font
